lead_paragraph: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau said two credit bureaus had deceived customers into buying scores of questionable value. Experts say consumers have multiple scores, not just one.
snippet: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau said two credit bureaus had deceived customers into buying scores of questionable value. Experts say consumers have multiple scores, not just one....

headline.main: A Settlement Highlights the Complexity of Credit Scores
headline.print_headline: $23 Million Settlement Highlights the Complexity of Credit Scores
